Title: Worldsoul: World Boss
Description:
Hallowfall is not the only land beset by enemies. 

Great monsters wander all of Khaz Algar--savage beasts and intelligent fiends alike. They murder Arathi, earthen, and adventurers in equal measure from innocent farmers to great warriors. 

I know the Sacred Flame burns in you. You are our best hope to hunt these great evils.
ObjectivesText: Defeat any World Boss and 5 rare creatures in Khaz Algar.
